author: Lotte Duncan
method: Melt the butter in a saucepan and add the onions and cook for 10 minutes over a gentle heat. Add the apples and cook for 2 minutes. Then add the rest of the ingredients and simmer gently for 10 minutes.
ingredients: 2oz (50g) butter,  1 large onion, chopped,  2 dessert apples, peeled, cored and diced,  6 tomatoes, chopped,  1 tbsp  cider vinegar,  1 tbsp sweet mincemeat (see separate recipe),  2 tsp dark brown muscovado sugar,  salt and pepper
